original_text: A person who is like that never knows what to do. He has many ideas in his mind. He should not think that he will receive anything from the Lord.
korean_text: 두 마음을 품어 모든 일에 정함이 없는 자로다

sentences.original_text: A person who is like that

sentences.korean_translation: 무엇을 해야 할지 결코 알지 못한다

sentences.original_text: He has many ideas in his mind
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 마음속에 많은 생각을 가지고 있다
